intro: Elatostema oligotrichum, commonly known as the narrow-leaved elatostema, is a small herbaceous plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related species. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and rocky areas. Its leaves are usually narrow and have a distinctive, hairy texture. Elatostema oligotrichum is characterized by its small, greenish-white flowers and is often found in coastal or subtropical regions.
